name: Army School - Training Courses
description:
You are now parts of the army and you have to pass all the initial training levels. Here you will get to know the army management skills as well as running skills. The levels of this army survival training have been designed according to the perspective of military training. In few missions of soldier skills you need to jump the hurdles.
Features:
- Challenging Mission of shooting skills
- Enjoy drill sergeants fun
- Realistic environment of night combat
- Smooth controls of US firefighting skills
- Many hours of free fun
- Amazing 3D Graphics.
